      sounds like a hollywood blockbuster

12.11.23  5:08 pm   have you thought about learning an alternative keyboard layout?

      no

12.11.23  4:05 pm   Does it get better?

      yes

12.11.23  3:26 pm   Do you think there is a way to predict the past?

      there was

12.11.23  2:32 pm   what was the last non-standard tuning your guitar was in

      almost certainly drop-D

12.11.23  2:31 pm   When is someone a nice person?

      right now

12.11.23  2:21 pm   What's an interesting song?

      how about pop goes the weasel........ with no weasel

12.11.23  2:02 pm   how do I help my days from feeling the same? everyday just seems like a bad repeat of the last.

      you'll wanna go ahead and invent anti-gravity

12.11.23  1:46 pm   thoughts on travelling by railroad?

      it's fine

12.11.23  1:45 pm   bill, if a landmass is surrounded entirely by rivers does that make it an island

      whether or not it's surrounded by rivers makes no difference. any landmass would have to be an island. otherwise you would have called it just 'part of a landmass'

12.11.23  11:13 am   When will things start making sense?

      right at the beginning

12.11.23  10:52 am   tips on how to not be a liar 

      say that you are. that should be at least logistically insane

12.11.23  9:41 am   How many songs have you written?

      i'm not sure

12.11.23  9:34 am   not doing enough compared to peers and feel like a loser what do i do

      try to do even less, for a period of time, while you think about what it is you truly wish to do. then when you come back, you will have the energy and focus to have both quality and quantity on your side

12.11.23  9:14 am   what is the worst question you've ever been asked?

      all of them are equally bad

12.11.23  5:25 am   your thoughts on your thoughts?

      extremely loud

12.11.23  4:54 am   "when someone says 'you've found your niche' that means it's an emergency, you need to get out of the niche" what did you mean by this?

      maybe it seems like someone just pigeonholed you

12.11.23  4:51 am   Why do so many songs talk about love?

      perhaps that's generally the climax of the human experience

12.11.23  4:19 am   how soft is the soft clothing

      soft enough to be accused of cheating, in softness contests

12.11.23  3:13 am   how many languages do you know

      about 1.7

12.11.23  2:07 am   Can you give any advice for song writing? Not only about the "Musical part", but specially how you come up with lyrics. Thanks

      it's all together. i can't write lyrics non-musically, and writing music with no linguistic/situational context also often runs out of fuel quickly. one of the best tricks is to imagine a scene, a setting, a physical location, and then think about what would happen next. and imagine how that would be sung, into words, with full blown melodic/harmonic realization

12.11.23  2:07 am   how does one deal with the bad stuff that they keep hidden that nobody knows about 

      i have no idea, and neither do you. because, as you said, neither of us knows about it

12.11.23  1:56 am   Has there ever been a time where you were going to say yes but now that you think about it no?

      yes

12.10.23  11:35 pm   how do I type?

      start by pressing all the buttons and see if any of them does anything

12.10.23  10:25 pm   Opinions on airplanes?

      insanely futuristic, and insanely old-fashioned at the same time

12.10.23  10:23 pm   if you were to be alone at home for a few months again and you had to pick a pet to be with you, would it be a dog, a cat, a horse, a roomba or a tamagotchi?

      it would be none of those, but if i had to limit it to among the choices you offered me, it would be roomba

12.10.23  10:01 pm   should i start a band

      sure

12.10.23  9:41 pm   roughly how many songs on your to-cover list

      i think about 900

12.10.23  9:30 pm   have you eaten any snow this year,

     no

     or do you not any year

      i usually don't

12.10.23  8:31 pm   how do you view your style?

      i continue to find it impossible to not be myself

12.10.23  7:58 pm   what was the 27th word you said yesterday

      i have no idea

12.10.23  7:20 pm   what are you working on right now

      it's like the kinds of things people work on when they make movies, or songs, or albums, except instead of them doing it it's me

12.10.23  6:46 pm   bill what should i draw?? I wanna draw something but when i draw it feels like i can't. My ideas are leaving me at this very second i type this...

      draw everything, one thing at a time

12.10.23  6:25 pm   The spoon gods are asking for their spoons back. How do I tell them I gave them up for lent?

      maybe you could just tell them in english. or whatever language they spoke to you in, which presumably was either english or something you were able to understand and then translate to english

12.10.23  4:52 pm    if you bought a hill, what would you name it?

      i'd name it "i can't believe this hill was for sale"

12.10.23  2:53 pm   do you have a favorite Song?

     no

      if yes, wich one is it?

12.10.23  2:25 pm   Bill, I just have one question for you. What color is an orange?

      mostly orange

12.10.23  1:20 pm   Which is better, a rabbit or a taco?

      they are equally good

12.10.23  1:13 pm   Evening Bill, Have you ever listened to albums by Genesis?

      no

12.10.23  1:00 pm   opinion on carmel corn

      can't be real

12.10.23  12:46 pm   There's the saying that time flies, but could time physically fly?

      time is involved with all physical motion. including flying

12.10.23  12:37 pm   Do you write songs with a tune in mind or do you come up with one after writing the lyrics,

     song lyrics don't exist without a melody. at least for me. that would be like drawing a picture without paper and then putting the paper under it later

     if it depends, which do you do more, I know you wrote "and the day goes on" with a folk progression in mind, and I was just wondering if that was all like that, which it probably isn't

     usually it's all very much at the same time. in rare cases a melody may manifest itself first, but i wouldn't count on it. to propel the melody forward, use words, and to propel words forward, use melody. they need to go at it together, otherwise no one really gets anywhere

12.10.23  12:27 pm   Do you consider yourself a particularly honest guy, compared to most people you've met?

      i don't think i have any way of knowing

12.10.23  11:58 am   i've noticed that the moon is made of cheese a lot shorter than other songs from that era of your songs, is there a reason for that?

      it exhausted itself much quicker

12.10.23  11:35 am   What's going on?

      everything is getting more .... shapely

12.10.23  9:54 am   hey bill wurtz, do you know what month it is? i know already, just to ask you if you know

      got to be either the 12th or 13th

12.10.23  9:08 am   Is Oasis one of your influences?

      all i know is the part that goes ...."like to say to you but i don't know how"

12.10.23  8:39 am   thoughts on rubber ducks

      fake

12.10.23  7:27 am   thoughts on the percent sign?

      it looks like it's derived from a fraction. i think the old version may have had 2 circles on the botton instead of just 1, and that makes me think it is derived from a fraction with 100 on the bottom

12.10.23  5:17 am   i realised i suck at the things that im proud of with myself. how can i improve?

      i don't know, but the best thing you can do in this situation is try to realize that everyone else sucks the exact same amount
